name: Grimskin

skills.name: Tarry Fist
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.name: Frustrating Muck
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Ichor Fling
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of removing 1 random buff from each target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
